coloredTexts.text: We are not going to let you to destroy our village!
It's time to stop you, Illagers!
Why do you hate us so much?!
Attack! And let none of them be left standing!
Ring the bells! Protect this village no matter what!
We need all the support possible. Don't just stand there!
All civilians inside the houses. Now!
Take your weapons! They are attacking us!
There is no room for failure. Fight with all your might!
Let's show them that they are wrong for messing with us!
